title.rendered: Doubling Sales – and Paying it Forward – with Marketing Automation

content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”overflow //gradient-lt-dk-gray-with-ss-while-logo” css=”.vc_custom_1589928570441{margin-bottom: 9rem !important;padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1561135322185{margin-right: 10% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Discover how one agency used SharpSpring marketing automation to help a restaurant client during the COVID-19 pandemic.

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1589911532351{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}” el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]When the COVID-19 pandemic struck, restaurant sales diminished nationwide. Meanwhile, by utilizing SharpSpring automation tools, First and South restaurant was able to pinpoint opportunities based on visitor behaviors, quickly follow up and adjust where appropriate.

The result? Doubled monthly sales of $50,000!

Check out this case study and discover how Robert McInnis Consulting partnered with SharpSpring to help First and South:

  • Increase monthly sales during hard times
  • Identify and nurture more than 700 new prospects
  • Give back to their community by feeding hundreds of local health workers

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class=”custom-testimonial”][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”m-t-minus-25-percent” offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

excerpt.rendered: Learn how one agency used SharpSpring marketing automation to double its client base while showing clients more value from their partnership.
